name: Chiptune DJ
description: Chiptune DJ is a rythm based game where you play along catchy 8-bit chiptune music to improve your rythmic and coordination skills. Build up your combos and beat your previous scores as you get better and better.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb Storage: 100 MB available space
